kepcoinPage.subtitle: Track how you earn and spend Kepcoin across the platform.

freeze.title: Streak freeze chip
freeze.description: Freezing automatically saves your streak if you miss a day and don't complete daily tasks.

earns.title: No earnings yet
earns.subtitle: Complete challenges and tasks to start earning Kepcoin.

spends.title: No spends yet
spends.subtitle: Spend Kepcoin on solutions, tests, or boosts when you need them.

earn.title: How to Earn Kepcoin
earn.description: To earn this currency, you need to contribute to the development of the system. For example, Kepcoin:

items.challengeRatings: For being the winner in daily, weekly, and monthly challenge ratings
items.editing: For helping in editing problems (writing solutions, translation, adding tags, finding similar problems)

spend.title: How to Spend Kepcoin
spend.description: Use your Kepcoin to unlock content, boost ratings, and explore more learning materials.

items.viewTest: View a test with a failed solution
items.doubleRating: Double rating change in contest (even if negative, it doubles)
items.keepRating: Maintain rating in contest (not given if negative)

shop.title: Shop
shop.subtitle: Redeem your Kepcoins for gear and accessories inspired by KEP.uz.
shop.loadError: Could not load products right now. Please try again soon.
shop.emptySubtitle: Come back later to spend your Kepcoins on new items.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.subtitle: See upcoming training slots and events on the shared calendar.
calendar.loadError: Could not load calendar events. Please try again soon.
calendar.emptySubtitle: New training times will appear here once they are published.
